mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO declassify_log ( time, flow_id, phone_number, imsi, imei, adsl_account, client_ip, client_port, server_ip, server_port, client_region, server_region, original_file_name, packet_index, network_protocol, app_protocol, app_info, host_name, uid ) VALUES
( #{item.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NULL,
#{item.flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.adslAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.clientPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NULL,
#{item.serverIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.serverPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NULL,
#{item.clientRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.serverRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.originalFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.packetIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NULL,
#{item.networkProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.appProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.appInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.hostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL,
#{item.uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} NULL )
